definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: On a hot day there's nothing I like more than a cold orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得，大热天没有比来杯橘子汁更过瘾的了。

sentences.english: Jake had opened the refrigerator and was pouring orange juice on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 杰克打开了冰箱，把橘子汁打翻在地板上。

sentences.english: Do you want any orange juice today, Mrs. Landy?
sentences.chinese: 兰德太太，你今天要橘子汁吗？

sentences.english: The orange juice has been concentrated.
I like beer, but I prefer orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢啤酒，但我更喜欢橘子汁。

sentences.english: Every day she reconstitutes the frozen orange juice by adding water.
sentences.chinese: 她每天把冰冻的橘子汁加水使成原状。

sentences.english: In that case, let me have a glass of orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 那样的话，麻烦给我一杯橘子汁。

sentences.english: But his income only could afford a jar of orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 但他的收入只够买一罐橘子汁。

sentences.english: Add three cans of water to make the orange juice.
Now you put a speck of orange juice in the water .
sentences.chinese: 现在你在水里放一点点橘子汁。

sentences.english: Fruit-flavoured tea can be three times more damaging than orange juice, a study found.
sentences.chinese: 一项研究发现，果味茶对牙齿的损害是橘子汁的三倍。

sentences.english: I have some orange in the cup.
sentences.chinese: 我杯子里有一些橘子汁儿。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
